group_1.textLeft: Haa...

group_1.textRight: Is something the matter?

group_1.textLeft: No, it's nothing.

group_1.textRight: It's been a long time since you've had a break@from your job or schoolwork, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...that's true.

group_1.textRight: I do hope that your job is going well,@but overdo it, okay?

group_1.textLeft: ...Okaaay.

group_1.textRight: ...Now then, it's 5 o'clock already.@I should probably start preparing dinner soon.
Mifuyu is coming to visit us today, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... Because of the circumstances with@her teacher, her lessons are on break.
I got an email from her saying that she wanted@to come and visit after such a long time away...

group_1.textRight: It's going to be dark outside soon, you know...
Did she tell you what time it'll be?

group_1.textLeft: I emailed and called her,@but I haven't had any responses back yet...
(...This week we haven't even started patrolling yet.)
(Maybe she came across a witch somewhere...?)
...I think I'm going to look around a little.

group_1.textRight: Be careful.

group_1.textLeft: Right.

group_1.textCenter: (...I can't feel any signs of Mifuyu or a@witch...)
(She wasn't on the road between our house@and the station either...)
(Where could you be, I just need a sign...)

group_1.textRight: I finally found you...

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Yacchan...

group_1.textRight: You said you were on your way to my house,@but then I couldn't contact you at all.
I was worried...!

group_1.textLeft: My apologies...
My mother came to pick me up from school...
And then my cell phone was taken...@and I was told that I couldn't go out...

group_1.textRight: Then why are you here...?@Did you sneak out of the house?

group_1.textLeft: That...I was going to be scolded about my lessons@no matter what... So I just didn't want to be at home...

group_1.textRight: ...If that's the case,@then I wish that you would have come to us...

group_1.textLeft: I wanted to, but...

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu...?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't want those at Mikazuki Manor to worry@about me...
...I can't do this anymore...@I'm at my limit...!

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: All of this scolding...@No one accepts me and my life is nothing but pain...
I could only endure it because I had time to dream@of anything that I wanted...
But recently I can't even see my dreams anymore...!
I can't even rest for a moment...!
This reality...@I can't do this anymore...!

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu, calm down...!

group_1.textLeft: Yacchan!@What is it that I should do...!?
You can live your life as an ordinary girl...
...while I can't even begin to dream of salvation...!

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu...

group_1.textLeft: All this crying in front of the store is going@to make it hard for customers to enter.
If you're going to cry, then cry outside.

group_1.textRight: Ah... It's the store's owner...
...No, it's nothing.
I just got into a little fight with my friend,@ that's all...

group_1.textLeft: Is that it...?

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu...@If we stay here, then your mother might find you.
Let's go somewhere else...

group_1.textLeft: ...Uuu, okay...
